quote: And so I've written everything down, too afraid of my demons and what they may say, the doubt that eats at me from the inside. Too afraid that I'll forget and it'll all be a madwoman's dream.
quote_letters: AND SO IVE WRITTEN EVERYTHING DOWN TOO AFRAID OF MY DEMONS AND WHAT THEY MAY SAY THE DOUBT THAT EATS AT ME FROM THE INSIDE TOO AFRAID THAT ILL FORGET AND ITLL ALL BE A MADWOMANS DREAM
